permissions: Allowed for admins or the proffer creator (policy update? checks admin or created_by).
side_effects: Updates the proffer; changes to title/description/kind trigger background regeneration of title, embeddings, and moderation status (involves OpenAI calls).
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --title, --description, or --kind must be provided. If title is provided, it must be present and unique. kind, if provided, must be one of hot_feed_post or make_it_so_action.

flags.name: --title
flags.validation: If provided, must be present and unique.
